name: Boo Reinvest
description: Stakes {{token}} in [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/pools) to receive xBOO which is staked to earn HEC. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Boo Reinvest
en.description: Stakes {{token}} in [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/pools) to receive xBOO which is staked to earn HEC. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Boo Reinvest
fr.description: Stake du {{token}} sur [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/pools) pour recevoir des jetons xBOO qui sont stakés pour gagner des jetons HEC. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Boo Reinvest
es.description: Hace staking de {{token}} en [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/pools) para recibir xBOO con el cual se hace staking para ganar HEC. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

de.name: Boo Reinvest
de.description: Stakes {{token}} in [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/pools) to receive xBOO which is staked to earn HEC. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

el.description: Stakes {{token}} in [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/pools) to receive xBOO which is staked to earn HEC. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

tr.name: Boo Reinvest
tr.description: HEC kazanmak için stake edilen xBOO'yu almak için [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/pools)'da {{token}} stake yapın. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır ve ardından stratejiye geri yatırılır.

vi.name: Boo Reinvest
vi.description: Stakes {{token}} in [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/pools) to receive xBOO which is staked to earn HEC. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Boo Reinvest
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 质押到 [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/pools) 以获取 xBOO，再质押 xBOO 以赚取 HEC。收获到的奖励会卖掉，换为更多的 {{token}} 再进行复投。

hi.name: Boo Reinvest
hi.description: {{token}} को [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance/pools) में xBOO प्राप्त करने के लिए दांव पर लगाता है जिसे HEC कमाने के लिए दांव पर लगाया जाता है। अर्जित टोकन वसूल किया जाता है, अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
